title: Who should I get?
body:
I want Zed, Taliyah and Yasou. I know that all 3 of them are awesome but I don't know which one do get, Or if I should just buy something else instead like hextech or IP boost, I'm summoner level 26, can you please help me decide?
{{champion:238}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Depends.

If you want to play the champ you get in ranked, don't get Zed. (75% ban rate)

If you want to win matches, don't get Taliyah. (38% win rate)

If you want to mirror match in normals, get Yasuo. (22% popularity)
Reply if you think I should get something else (I have 1013 RP)
